overview: Howen Technologies Co.,Ltd provides End to End Solution for CCTV system, including various type of analog cameras and IP camera, video server, DVR, mobile DVR, NVR, IP SAN storage and management software. The products and system have been widely applied in shops, villas, Hotel, Mall, Education, office building, airport, city surveillance, hospital and government projects etc. website:www.howentech.com Tel:+86 755 86315495 Fax:+86 755 86315490
